verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H410>God<s%> to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H410>belongs,<s%> you God to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H3313>belongs,<s%> shine forth.
Rise <S%H5375>up,<s%> you <S%H8199>judge<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H7725>Pay<s%> back the <S%H1343>proud<s%> what they <S%H1576>deserve.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how long will the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> how long will the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5937>triumph?<s%>
They <S%H5042>pour<s%> out <S%H6277>arrogant<s%> <S%H1696>words.<s%> All the <S%H205>evildoers<s%> <S%H6466><s%> <S%H559>boast.<s%>
They break your <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H1792>pieces,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>
They <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> and <S%H7523>murder<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>
They <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3050>"Yah<s%> will not <S%H7200>see,<s%> neither will <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H995>consider.<s%>"
<S%H995>Consider,<s%> you <S%H1197>senseless<s%> among the <S%H5971>people;<s%> you <S%H3684>fools,<s%> when will you be <S%H7919>wise?<s%>
He who <S%H5193>implanted<s%> the <S%H241>ear,<s%> <S%H8085>won't<s%> he hear? He who <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H5027>won't<s%> he see?
He who <S%H3256>disciplines<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3198>won't<s%> he punish? He who <S%H3925>teaches<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1847>knows.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that they are <S%H1892>futile.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> whom you <S%H3256>discipline,<s%> <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> out of your <S%H8451>law;<s%>
that you may give him <S%H8252>rest<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity,<s%> until the <S%H7845>pit<s%> is <S%H3738>dug<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5203>won't<s%> reject his <S%H5971>people,<s%> neither will he <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
For <S%H4941>judgment<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> All the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall follow <S%H310>it.<s%>
Who will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> for me against the <S%H7489>wicked?<s%> Who will stand <S%H3320>up<s%> for me against <S%H6466>the<s%> <S%H205>evildoers?<s%>
<S%H3884>Unless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had been my <S%H5833>help,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> would have <S%H4592>soon<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%> in <S%H1745>silence.<s%>
When I <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H7272>foot<s%> is <S%H4131>slipping!<s%>" Your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> held me <S%H5582>up.<s%>
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H8575>me,<s%> your comforts <S%H8173>delight<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1942>wickedness<s%> have <S%H2266>fellowship<s%> with <S%H3335>you,<s%> which brings about <S%H5999>mischief<s%> by <S%H2706>statute?<s%>
They gather themselves <S%H1413>together<s%> against the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has been my high <S%H4869>tower,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>

He has <S%H7725>brought<s%> on them their own <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and will cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in their own <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> will cut them <S%H6789>off.<s%>
